item.description:
Hello All,

Please take a moment to read the complete update below.... Thank you to all who attended our last Meetup!

Here is a special announcement a "Special Event " will be taking place at Doggie Day Playcenter, Thursday, March 20, 2008!!!!
Feel free to bring your pet as this is a "mini-meetup" for all the Boston Chi members....

Meet and Greet with
Amy Citarell of Harvest Moo

" Amy is a talented artist who in a whimsical and bright way can
capture your pet?s most intimate or crazy moments with oil on
canvas. Each painting is an original that you will have for
your entire life.

Please join us on Thursday, March 20, 2008 from 6pm-8pm at the
DoggieDay play center located at 400 Tremont St, Boston, MA for
a meet and greet with this aspiring artist. You can also bring
a favorite photo with you to have Amy convert into a timeless
art piece.

More information about Amy Citarell and Harvest Moo can be
found online at www.harvestmoo.com

If you are unable to meet Amy this Thursday, samples of her
work can be viewed at the DoggieDay Play Center.

Look forward to seeing you there!"


We will also be meeting again on April 13th at 1PM for our meetup. I am hoping to plan a special event for the spring so please stay tuned.


Note:
There is some free parking located behind Doggieday Playcenter (Tremont Street) and the CVS, for non-residents of the area there are also plenty of metered spots near DoggieDay located on Tremont street as well as "South End visitor parking spots" located on each end of the street in the South end . Although those may be harder to come by.

Stay well....ST




DOGGIE DAY PLAYCENTER ( 400 Tremont Street, South end, Boston,02116 ...our usual location 1:00PM ONLY!
http://www.doggieday....
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua April Meeting
